description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Immerse yourself in the underworld of the 1920s era prohibition period. 6 Unique game modes, a custom game mode editor, upgradable GUI, unlockable Milestones, and many other features will test your trading skills for a long time to come.
description.short: Immerse yourself in the underworld of the 1920s era prohibition period. 6 Unique game modes, a custom game mode editor, upgradable GUI, unlockable Milestones, and many other features will test your trading skills for a long time to come.
